name: Count Your Chickens!
description:
Take control of a dog and protect the baby chicks from getting eaten by foxes!  Use W to move forward in the direction of the mouse pointer, bark with spacebar to move animals, and sprint with left Shift.  

This started as a prototype of a counting system and became the first experience I have ever created on my new journey to learn game development!  

Constructive criticism is appreciated and encouraged!

Thanks for playing!
